content: I am an associate research scientist in the Department of Computer Information Systems, Texas A&M University Central Texas, United States. My research interests are focused on computer science, and more specifically on software engineering, cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, model-driven engineering, and empirical software engineering. I am involved in a main project with U.S. agencies. I conduct applied research in the fields of cybersecurity and artifical intelligence. Prior to coming to the United States, I was a research associate at the University of Luxembourg from December 2018 to April 2021. I received my B.Sc. from the University of Bari (Italy), M.Sc. from the University of Castilla-La Mancha (Spain) and Ph.D. from Carleton University (Canada) in 2009, 2011 and 2018, respectively.
summary: I am an associate research scientist in the Department of Computer Information Systems, Texas A&M University Central Texas, United States. My research interests are focused on computer science, and more specifically on software engineering, cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, model-driven engineering, and empirical software engineering.
title: Damiano Torre
